data.name: OwnerIdNotEmptyGuid
data.value: Owner ID cannot be an empty GUID.

data.name: OwnerIdUserNotExist
data.value: User with the specified Owner ID does not exist.

data.name: BoardIdNotEmptyGuid
data.value: Board ID cannot be an empty GUID.

data.name: RequestingUserIdNotEmptyGuid
data.value: Requesting User ID cannot be an empty GUID.

data.name: RequestingUserIdUserNotExist
data.value: User with the given Requesting User ID does not exist.

data.name: FileTypeInvalid
data.value: Unsupported file type. Allowed types are: JPEG, PNG, GIF.

data.name: BoardDeleteNotOwner
data.value: Only the owner can delete the board.

data.name: NotMemberOfBoard
data.value: You are not a member of this board.

data.name: OwnerCannotLeaveBoard
data.value: The owner cannot leave the board. Delete it instead.

data.name: UserIsMemberAlready
data.value: User is already a member of this board.

data.name: CannotRemoveOwner
data.value: Cannot remove the owner of the board.

data.name: CannotRemoveSelf
data.value: You cannot remove yourself from the board.

data.name: OnlyMembersCanSetWallpaper
data.value: Only board members can set the wallpaper image.

data.name: OnlyMembersCanDeleteWallpaper
data.value: Only board members can delete the wallpaper image.

data.name: CompletedAtCannotBeInFuture
data.value: CompletedAt cannot be in the future.

data.name: RoleIdRequired
data.value: Assign a role to the member.

data.name: MemberDoesNotHavePermission
data.value: The member does not have the specified permission.

data.name: CannotRemoveLastPermission
data.value: Cannot remove the last permission from a member.

data.name: BoardListIdNotEmptyGuid
data.value: Board List ID cannot be an empty GUID.

data.name: PositionGreaterThanZero
data.value: Position must be greater than zero.

data.name: UserIdNotEmptyGuid
data.value: User ID cannot be an empty GUID.

data.name: UserIdToAddUserNotExist
data.value: User to add does not exist.

data.name: CardIdNotEmptyGuid
data.value: Card ID cannot be an empty GUID.

data.name: OnlyOwnerCanAddPermissions
data.value: Only the board owner can add permissions to members.

data.name: OnlyOwnerCanRemovePermissions
data.value: Only the board owner can remove permissions from members.

data.name: MemberNotFoundOnBoard
data.value: The specified member does not belong to the board.

data.name: CannotRemoveOwnPermissions
data.value: You cannot remove permissions from yourself.

data.name: FailedToUploadBlob
data.value: Failed to upload file to blob storage.

data.name: FailedToDownloadBlob
data.value: Failed to download file from blob storage.

data.name: BlobFileNotFound
data.value: File not found in blob storage.

data.name: UnexpectedBlobDownloadError
data.value: An unexpected error occurred while downloading the file from blob storage.

data.name: BoardIdNotInRoute
data.value: Board ID is missing or invalid in route.

data.name: MissingRequiredPermission
data.value: You lack the required permission for this action.

data.name: NotificationBoardInviteTitle
data.value: You have been invited to a board

data.name: NotificationBoardRemovedTitle
data.value: You have been removed from the board

data.name: OllamaApiRequestFailedWithStatusCode
data.value: Ollama API request failed with status code: {0}

data.name: AiResponseEmptyOrNull
data.value: AI response was empty or null.

data.name: OllamaApiUnexpectedError
data.value: An error occurred while processing the Ollama API request.
